messages.subject: Re: UU in SA
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/1/2002 5:27:11 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Ah, but then you will have a place where you don t need to explain such things! Kathryn
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/1/2002 5:27:11 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> We are looking for a new church and I just attended this one and thought it
> was wonderful. I'm wanting to go back but it is a bit of a drive. Of
> course, dh is thinking all we need is one more thing about our family to
> have to explain to people, as if being an unschooling, semi-homesteading,
> mixed race, adoptive family isn't enough.
>

Ah, but then you will have a place where you don't need to explain such
things!
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: UU in SA
messages.msgSnippet: Of course, dh is thinking all we need is one more thing about our family to ... You won t have to explain it to anyone at the church.  I still look up
messages.messageBody:
<snip>Of course, dh is thinking all we need is one more thing about our
family to
> have to explain to people, as if being an unschooling, semi-homesteading,
> mixed race, adoptive family isn't enough.

You won't have to explain it to anyone at the church. I still look up the
sermons on the website because we just can't find another UU church like it
up here. My kids even liked it there and that is saying a lot.

Cheryl

messages.subject: Re: UU in SA
messages.msgSnippet: We are looking for a new church and I just attended this one and thought it was wonderful.  I m wanting
messages.messageBody:
<<that was the church I grew up in.. on the hill..>>

We are looking for a new church and I just attended this one and thought it
was wonderful. I'm wanting to go back but it is a bit of a drive. Of
course, dh is thinking all we need is one more thing about our family to
have to explain to people, as if being an unschooling, semi-homesteading,
mixed race, adoptive family isn't enough.

Julie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: UU in SA
messages.msgSnippet: it s the explaining to other kids that becomes tiresome.. i remember. i was one.... but not all that bad.. i was kind of uppity about the fact that i was a
messages.messageBody:
it's the explaining to other kids that becomes tiresome.. i remember. i was one.... but not all that bad.. i was kind of uppity about the fact that i was a unitarian and so was thomas jefferson
L

You won't have to explain it to anyone at the church. I still look up the

up here. My kids even liked it there and that is saying a lot.

Cheryl
